title: 820-2915 fan spin no chime
message:
After replacing r7978 and getitng the board into an S0 state with fan spin I get no image or chime seems likes its brain dead. Fans will spin fast but nothing happens no image on screen nothing on external either.

any ideas?

title: 820-2915 fan spin no chime
message: do u have all CPU Rails ?

title: 820-2915 fan spin no chime
message: History? Why was the resistor replaced?

title: 820-2915 fan spin no chime
message:
Im not too sure on the history. the board wasnt powering on but getting to an s3 state. Replaced the resistor because it was giving a low value compared to known good and that got it to fan spin.

board has no PPVCORE_S0_CPU rail.

title: 820-2915 fan spin no chime
message: Low value is because you are measuring in-circuit so there was never anything wrong. You can heat up the GPU and see if it lives again. If it still has an original GPU with date code 11/12 this board is a waste of time anyway as it is a ticking time bomb.

title: 820-2915 fan spin no chime
message: I cannot find the date on this thing. Heating it up changed nothing.

title: 820-2915 fan spin no chime
message: Of course there is a date code on the GPU.....

title: 820-2915 fan spin no chime
message:
date code is 11/13
i have no cpu vcore

not sure if this is normal but u5400,u5410 and u5430 are all outputting around 0.30-0.50v
also vcc of u7400 is only getting 4.97v it should be 5v right?

title: 820-2915 fan spin no chime
message:
Old GPU which is going to fail soon if it is not already dead. No Vcore also sucks in general. 
4.97 vs 5.00, do you really think that will matter? Do you really think your multimeter/probes etc. will be accurate enough to worry about 0.03V?

Could be bad BIOS/bad CPU/bad PCH/knocked off resistor/anything and next month a dead GPU. Save yourself the headache and forget about this one.

title: 820-2915 fan spin no chime
message:
My multimeter is over by .3 so i usually get 5.3v on 5v lines so thats why i asked it would mean im probably arounf 4.94?

i shall forget i suppose.

title: 820-2915 fan spin no chime
message: You can try another BIOS but after that it will be a time waster.
